fields.Name: Kael Thorne
fields.Relationships: Mentor to Ryn; Former commander in Ashen Guard

fields.Name: Ryn
fields.Role: Young apprentice with a gift for elemental magic
fields.Motivation: Prove her worth outside Kael’s shadow

fields.Name: The Blackspire Wastes
fields.Description: Volcanic ruin once home to the Ashen Guard. Twisted remnants of its past burn beneath the surface.
fields.Significance: The Order of the Black Flame’s birthplace and battlefield of Aethergate

fields.Name: Order of the Black Flame
fields.Goals: Resurrect the Primordial Flame and remake the world
fields.Allies / Enemies: Opposes the Emberlight Syndicate; aligned with Kael in the past

fields.Name: The Emberlight Syndicate
fields.Beliefs / Code: No flame burns without air; magic must be earned
fields.Allies / Enemies: Trains mages like Ryn; opposes the Order of the Black Flame

fields.Name: The Siege of Aethergate
fields.Summary: The final standoff between the Emberlight Syndicate and the Order of the Black Flame.
fields.Who Was Involved: Kael Thorne, Ryn, Order of the Black Flame, Emberlight Syndicate
fields.Why It Matters: Marked the end of the Elemental War and the downfall of the Ashen Guard

fields.Name: Ashen Sigil
fields.Description: A scorched medallion worn by Black Flame elites. Glows when near deep elemental energy.
fields.Powers / Purpose: Enhances destructive magic, links minds of its bearers
fields.Origin / Lore: Forged in the Blackspire Wastes and carried by Kael before his exile
